answers.answer: I can relate ive been gaining alot of weight and baby meassured bigger tgen he shld and turns out i have gestational diabetes but i got the glucose test late hope this is not the case with u gl
I am 34. weeks but measuring 35 weeks.I dnt know how but doc has given me to test glucose.I had given blood for sample.

My midwife said if baby measures big theres a possibility of gestational diabetes.  And if meansuring smaller then sometimes the placenta isnt working properly.  Either way they should be doimg further tests to rule out gestational diabetes. Have u had a blood test done recently?  Or wen they measured u? Hope its not. Good luck.x
For laiba. One week bigger or smaller shouldn't make much difference. I measured a week smaller at 28 weeks and midwife said she wasnt concerned.x

Im 31 weeks pregnant with my second. Usually when you measure big like that its a sign of gestational diabetes. But when I was 28 weeks I was measuring 35 weeks and yesterday at my 31 week appointment Im measuring 33 weeks. Dr said it could have been a build up of amniotic fluid or just how the baby was laying. I don't have gestational diabetes.
But she will perform a c section according to weeks at 37 she said.

question: I'm 24weeks today and I am measuring at 30weeks? I've also gained 30 pounds this is pretty excessive. Can any moms relate to what I am going through and what it could be?
title: meausing big
